titleInfo.title: Hatch Show Print Letterpress Exhibit at the Oklahoma Ad Club

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Three color window card (black and red on green) announcing Hatch Show Print exhibition at the Oklahoma City Ad Club on display on May 14. Poster features a woodcut logo thought to be designed by Will T. Hatch and re-emerged in the early 1980s. Logo continues to be the current Hatch Show Print trademark.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
